data.comment: The match has started at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
The first half has been concluded at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Remco Balk.
The away team have replaced Antony Santos with David Neres. This is the first substitution made today by Erik ten Hag.
In the minute 60, Ajax's Ryan Gravenberch has been booked in Groningen.
Erik ten Hag (Ajax) is making a second substitution, with Jurgen Ekkelenkamp replacing Edson Alvarez.
Lassina Franck Traore is replacing Zakaria Labyad for Ajax at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
In the minute 69, Danny Buijs is making the team's first substitution at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium with Mo El Hankouri replacing Remco Balk.
Patrick Joosten is replacing Jorgen Strand Larsen for Groningen at Hitachi Capital Mobility Stadium.
Erik ten Hag (Ajax) has taken off Daley Blind who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Klaas-Jan Huntelaar is the replacement.
In the minute 76, Ajax make their fifth substitution with Lisandro Martinez replacing Noussair Mazraoui.
Danny Buijs (Groningen) is making a third substitution, with Thomas Poll replacing Ramon-Pascal Lundqvist.
Dennis Higler blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
The home team have replaced Daniel van Kaam with Romano Postema. This is the fourth substitution made today by Danny Buijs.
